lenders.name: jody
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: David Coates Memorial
lenders.loan_because: In memory of a wonderful husband, father of our four children,and pastor.
lenders.occupational_info:
David was a missionary to Japan 1954-1964 with Assemblies of God (UK) 
He pastored a church in Scarborough UK
He pastored churches in Independence Mo, Sigourney, Ia, and Paylos Park, Il, with the PCUSA. For a short time he was Clerk to Riverside Presbytery, CA

lenders.name: harry
lenders.loan_because: I started life in lower economic conditions and have learned the best way to become secure financially is to own a business.
lenders.occupational_info: wholesale business

lenders.name: Eleanora
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like, not to have things.I am a widow for 28 years, and it took a long time for someone to trust me and to loan me something.
lenders.occupational_info: I do bookkeeping for several small Companies, the ones who cannot afford to pay for a fulltime person.And I love what I do.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: It is a gift to be able to give to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Everyday I try to do my best, respect others and hope I've made things easier for someone who needed a little kindness.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the federal government in computer security

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Theodorus
lenders.loan_because: need for make medical check up and certificate travel and fit , i need about $2000,00
lenders.occupational_info: I get offer job at Hilton New York Hotel

lenders.name: Lo
lenders.loan_because: If I can help others achieve their dreams in some small way, it makes me happy. Everyone needs a helping hand every once in a while

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: It is a good deed, and a humanitarian thing to do.  If I have an amount of surplus, I see no reason not to loan.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a factory inspecting and assembling bearings (an automobile part.)  My factory then ships these parts to customers who put them into vehicles to sell.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to make a difference.

lenders.name: Sonoqui
lenders.occupational_info: We consider ourselves to be stewards of our land, not land owners. We endeavor to work in a way that sustains the life and health of the land, the cattle and ourselves.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and wish to share God's gifts with others.  There are many people in this world who work much harder than I, and I must admire them and do my best to help and support them in such a simple way.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me in so many ways and I am thankful that I can help others in need.  May He bless these industrious people.

lenders.name: Frances
lenders.loan_because: In today's world, we are all global neighbors who must understand and help each other.

lenders.name: Traci & Jeff
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed to be so fortunate & it feels good to help others in need.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: it allows my money to be borrowed, repaid and borrowed again.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired, but I volunteer many hours each week

lenders.name: D&M
lenders.loan_because: You feed a man a fish, you have fed him for a day. you teach a man how to fish, you have fed him for life.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I have been doing volunteer work in third world countries for the past 20 years. I have seen what a difference a small loan can make to a family and community.

lenders.name: Jasmine
lenders.occupation: Young activist for third world countries

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's the right thing to do.  :)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business owner and it is hard but rewarding work.  I retail and wholesale craft supplies to small business owners via the Internet.

lenders.name: Noel and Judith
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to help others to use their gifts and passion for their family, their community and the world. Through our lives, others have helped us - now it is our turn.
lenders.occupational_info: Noel's family motto: "Do all your work as to God." (It sounds better in Gaelic!)

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to live in a society where food is abundant and running water and shelter is taken for granted.  This is my small contribution...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom of three children.  My son is 3 years old and I have twin girls who are 17 months old; to say the least I am very busy!

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are working to make a better life for themselves and their families.  God has blessed me with a very fortunate life, and this is my way of giving back to the world. :)

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and I believe people should help others when they can.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell relaxation, healing music composed by my husband (who has already passed on).  His music is beautiful

lenders.name: joshm
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I've been where many people are now and I can relate to what they're going through.  This is my way of giving back to all those people who helped me out before things turned around for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for businesses as a consultant in advertising and public relations.

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.loan_because: my summer school community psychology professor introduced me to this and I think this is a very rewarding way to help people around the world and make a significant difference in someone else's life!
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am a full-time college student at the University of Illinois at Chicago majoring in Psychology. I will be graduating in Spring of 2008

lenders.name: Brian & Kim
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed!
lenders.occupational_info: Awesome!  Love what we do!  Come join us!

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance and retirement is overrated

lenders.name: jim & linda
lenders.loan_because: GOD IS GREAT! HE provides me more than we need. My wife Linda and I are so blessed. " His mercy endures forever"
lenders.occupational_info: Linda and I are nurses at City of Hope. We work with cancer patients. Our Catholic faith leads us to serve our Lord in works of charity to all. No conditions, no borders. Beautiful!

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: What a great way to make a difference in someone's life.  It seems so personal even though the people are so far away.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Social Studies teacher.  I teach high school, grades 9 - 12. I teach US History, American Government, Psychology and World Geography.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: My education is in economics and my faith is in the Holy Trinity. These types of loans provide market-based opportunities to people who have had far less opportunities than I've had. Jesus taught us that when we help the least among us we honor Him. Making microloans allows me to use the same dollars over and over to help others. Sustainable Philanthropy! How can it get better than that!
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell tiny ownership stakes in very large companies. I hope to buy low and sell high and make a profit. That's me chasing my son in the 50M dash. He's autistic and doesn't fully understand races but he loves being chased. As you can see, we're both having a great time.

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired elementary (5th grade) teacher.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: My physical disability makes it too hard to travel far and help in person. It seems that the dollar buys a lot more in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I use math and science on computers to find and fix problems in large complex sets of numbers.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people with good ideas provide service to their communites and be able to provide a good life for their kids.
lenders.occupational_info: I help direct the public buses so that people can get to work and to the store and kids can get to school.

lenders.name: Teramis
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone out.
lenders.occupational_info: I write novels.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want to be the change I wish to see in the world.

lenders.name: Frank & Nicole
lenders.loan_because: God told us "I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me." (Matthew 25:40)

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because:
I believe....

Our Lord spoke of investing talents...and as our seeds grow...we use the profits to reseed communities and spread God's love.
lenders.occupational_info: You are loved/ You are valued. We believe in you and trust in you to keep your promises and your dreams.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I am very  touched by the needs of women around the world. I want to stay connected and be part of the movement to end poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with men, women and children who have serious mental health problems.

lenders.name: Jim Smith
lenders.loan_because: This idea is the coolest application of technology I've seen in a long time!  Being a small part of it makes me feel like a mini-Bono!
lenders.occupational_info: I direct the efforts of lots of software development nerds like me.  They're good guys and gals and I'm the luckiest boss in the world!

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: It's exciting to watch others achieve their goals and know that we have been a small part of that. Good luck to everyone!
lenders.occupational_info: Property Angels is an independent, family owned and run real estate business on the North Fork of Long Island, New York. We know what it takes to build a small business!

lenders.name: Robert & Robin
lenders.loan_because: What seems like such a small amount to us can be very meaningful to someone living in a different part of the world. It's wonderful being able to pool our individual resources to make a difference in peoples' lives.

lenders.name: Meri
lenders.loan_because: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has."  -Margaret Meade-

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I deeply care about helping spread propserity throughout the world and I also feel very strongly towards rewarding the entrepreneurial spirit of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for our news department at our local television station. I research and write stories for various news reports.

lenders.name: Raphael
lenders.loan_because: I believe good fortune in life should be shared with others. Then maybe one day poverty can be eliminated...
lenders.occupational_info: I make the skys safe to fly for a major american airline company by inspecting airplanes for safety.

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see a fairer, more equitable society, where everyone has an equal opportunity to survive and thrive.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: a small investment from me enables those who want to better themself and their family to a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I retired at age 56 as a Controller in private business to enjoy life and have never regretted the decision.  As a confessed workaholic never took time for myself now life is great.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I spent a few years in Brasil as a teenager and the people there changed my life.  I want to give something back and be a part of this vibrant emerging nation where just a little help can mean such a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help introduce new nursing students to the world of bacteria, viruses and other disease causing agents as well as training them how to protect themselves and their patients from disease.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I love those who work hard to pursuit their dreams. I am truely inspired by someone who have the courage to build their dreams and make it happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a yoga teacher and a teacher teaches about energy. Basically helping people to find their inner-self!

lenders.name: Neil Geisler
lenders.occupational_info: I work on development of devices for disease diagnostics for global health care applications.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit counts. No one person can make everything better everywhere, but thousands working together can make some things better in some places. It feels good to be able to be one of those people helping to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I specialize in raising chili peppers and garlic, selling them primarily at local Farmers Markets. I also make and sell jelly made from the peppers and a wonderful garlic jelly. Along with that I also raise some herbs and other plants for sale. I do have another job, but it is the farming I really enjoy. As far as writing, I do bits and pieces of writing here and there and am working on a couple of books.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: it's a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Kanyi
lenders.loan_because: I give because serving other people is serving God.

lenders.name: Alison & Andrew
lenders.loan_because: We want to see real people using the money we loan.
lenders.occupational_info: Alison is a travel and nature photographer and Andrew helps large companies use the software designed by his company.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to have a well paid career which gives me the freedom to make choices about where I visit, the sort of lifestyle I want to lead and the ability not to have too many financial worries
lenders.occupational_info: I help organisations implement changes in their business to improve the way things are done, to reduce costs and enhance profits

lenders.name: CC
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled extensively and seen first hand the people with the small shops and farms trying to improve their lives. These loans allow me to support the global community in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: Management of complex commercial arrangements between companies for products and services

lenders.name: Niki
lenders.occupational_info: graphic designer

lenders.name: Margareta
lenders.loan_because: It's a good idea to get my money working!
lenders.occupational_info: Promotion

lenders.name: Romi & Harold
lenders.loan_because: People with marketable skills sometimes need a small helping hand to break through.  We can afford to do lots of small helping.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired Senior Chief Petty Officer, US Navy.

lenders.name: Søren Kiilerich
lenders.loan_because: I think the best you can do for anyone, is to give them their freedom - and Kiva is setting people free.

lenders.name: radouan
lenders.whereabouts: elkelaa des sraghna elkelaa des sraghna
lenders.loan_because: je suis un informaticien i need a help
lenders.occupational_info:
je suis un informaticien i need a help
analyste en informatique de gesrion

lenders.name: Inne
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the concept of Kiva. I trust it more than the way big NGOs operate. And in the end it's all about people helping people. The less noise between them the better ;-)
lenders.occupational_info:
I design products or solutions to problems. Years ago I made an artificial leg for landmine vitims in Cambodia and a new way to detect landmines (by using trained sniffing rats - they won't get harmed!). To read more, please visit: http://www.xs4all.nl/~inne/vs/legprot.htm or http://www.xs4all.nl/~inne/vs/report.htm or http://www.apopo.org
Today I have a small business in making websites where people meet and share knowledge (web 2.0)

lenders.name: omar
lenders.loan_because:
I want to still in my country Syria, but I've to do the mandatory milatery service (2 years) unless I pay $3000. So I've to leave my family to go to K.S.A or U.A.E to work for 5 years then I could pay $5000 to free myself.
I can pay now cause I lived in K.S.A for 12 years. So the laws here allow me to pay $3000.
I want to live in my country with my family , having my own work with a good position in a good company
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a websites programmer, Oracle OCA (database administrator).
working in IT technology field.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: This is a way that I can get involved in helping people improve their lives without having to give a lot at one time.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist attorneys with their work.  I work with people who have been injured in car accidents or on the job to try to make sure the insurance companies pay them what they deserve.

lenders.name: LORENZO
lenders.loan_because: IF I CAN HELP SOMEONE GET CLOSER TO THEIR DREAMS THEN MAYBE THEY WILL PAY IT FORWARD AND CONTINUE TO HELP SOMEONE ELSE.
lenders.occupational_info: I HELP YOUTH HELP THEMSELVES TOWARDS COMPETING AT A VARSITY AND COLLEGE LEVEL OF ATHLETICS.

lenders.name: Tom & Alice
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I lived in India for a couple of years.  We saw many small businesses that could really become solid with a modest capital source.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a state owned, residential facility for about 100 developmentally disabled individuals.

lenders.name: Lorenzo
lenders.loan_because: networking business
lenders.occupational_info: direct selling in networking

lenders.name: Wernfrid
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help and I can choose exactly who the money is going to.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people do smart things with their money.

lenders.name: Bob & Mary
lenders.loan_because: Bob and I feel that we have an obligation to help others. We are blessed to have jobs that allow us to do that but we want to do more.
lenders.occupational_info: Bob teaches 5th grade children in elementary school , preparing them for the life that is ahead of them . I work with old people  who  live in nursing homes, helping them to get stronger and to be as independent as possible as they near the end of their lives.

lenders.name: Inge
lenders.loan_because: Makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for 33 years in a consumer marketing research firm--helping food and household product companies make products that consumers want and need

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I can. Because it puts good back into the universe. Because I have been very fortunate in my life and I try to pass that on.

lenders.name: jonathan
lenders.loan_because:
We are blessed by God and charged with the  good stewardship of the gifts he has given us.  

There are many people who are not so blessed, and we can help them be good stewards as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I've spent a lot of time in the past making rich people money; now I help poor people instead.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I would like to assist entrepreneurs who want a "hand up" not a "hand out."
lenders.occupational_info: I managed investment and savings portfolios for individuals in Ontario, Canada utilizing stocks, bonds, mutual funds, GICs and life insurance products. As a retiree, I have many hobbies including genealogy and woodworking.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great idea and a fantastic site.  Good Luck to everyone!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell billboard advertising in Denver, CO.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful that God has blessed my life, and I hope to facilitate His blessings to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Specializing in sinkhole and foundation repairs throughout the state of Florida.

lenders.name: Tom & Danna
lenders.loan_because: God has always been good to us, and we appreciate the chance to share His blessings with some of His other children.
lenders.occupational_info: Working in communications, Thom writes news and magazine articles for a large company and also prepares and gives training courses. His daughter Danna recently graduated from high school and is preparing to enter university.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help diminish the gap between rich and poor and this is my way to help with that.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find information about lots of topics and help them improve their lives free through the library.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: We believe that a loan through  a wonderful program such as Kiva will help others achieve  success in their lives through their own accomplishments.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed so that we may bless others.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a kindergarten teacher.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I make video games for Playstations.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.occupational_info: School teacher

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: money is only useful if it flows
lenders.occupational_info: click, charge, loan, repeat

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I may not have a lot of money, but sharing what I have makes all the difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in my last year of college. where I study English and journalism.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I know first hand the impact a small loan can have from receiving one a number of years ago. It changed my life and helped kick-start my business. I enjoy returning the favor and helping other fellow entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I design web applications.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.occupation: Executive Director, Society of St. Vincent de Paul
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to take what they know and build their dreams, no matter where they live or who they are.
lenders.occupational_info: Faith-based charity offering emergency help for the poor.

lenders.name: Dan and Lynne Faulkner
lenders.loan_because: We have a desire to help others make this world a better place for the generations to come.  We honor the memory of our beloved son Jess.

lenders.name: Savani
lenders.loan_because: I belive in capitalism. What better way than to encourage a society of enterprenuers than this!
lenders.occupational_info: Developing software applications for genetic research.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful for the opportunity Kiva provides to help hardworking, deserving people around the world.

lenders.name: Corina
lenders.loan_because: I live in New Orleans and we've been through a lot the last couple of years, but I know that there are people out there that didn't even have what we had here before August 29, 2005. I like to see the specific people I'm helping with Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach language arts and writing to kids between the ages of 11-13. When I'm not doing that, I like to write stories about what the future will be like.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me so that I can bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help create and distribute computer software.

lenders.name: Maurie
lenders.loan_because: humankind is a family and these are my brothers and sisters in need
lenders.occupational_info: I write training materials to help adults learn new skill for their work

lenders.name: Gilligan
lenders.occupational_info: i sell music

lenders.name: FAYE
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed my husband and myself  with stepping out and starting our own business 5 years ago.  I want to bless others that are trying to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and his workers Repair and install electrical parts * equipment on ships. I do office work for our business.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to elementary students in South Korea.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 75 years old and spend my days helping my grandchildren find their way in life through counsel and financial aid when needed.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: sabrina
lenders.loan_because: I was given this as a gift because my friends know I really care about humanity. I am doing my best to help people and promote the greater good.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop educational products for all ages. My real passion is responsible consumerism. I am creating workshops to teach people how to use their dollars wisely to help people around the world and to reduce their eco-footprint!

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: It feel's great!
lenders.occupational_info: Mom, environmentalist

lenders.name: Earl
lenders.loan_because:
Loan purposes are worthwhile and re-payment rates are good.
Loan sharks need to be competed against by fair and reasonable interest rates.
The borrowers appear to be decent and hardworking.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired.  Being on a fixed income, I do not have a lot to loan, but I have more than most borrowers; so, I am willing to help and able to manage micro-loans.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: it's the best way I can think of to give a hand-up instead of a hand-out.
lenders.occupational_info: professional volunteer

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I feel that by doing this I might actually make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I make arrangements for people to travel to other cities and countries.

lenders.name: Betsy
lenders.loan_because: I see this as a way to surround the world with love.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people create create health through simple lifestyle changes.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Microlending is brilliant in its simplicity and I feel honored to participate in the process.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I find it ultimately rewarding to help others to help themselves. I credit Kiva.org with their extraordinary concept (with the help of modern technology) to reach far across many lands for those people that may assist those in need. I loan because I want to make a difference and support this project.
lenders.occupational_info: I handle spending for a large financial institution and produce music events.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people advance themselves through their own initiative.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: life is a blessing and to help others honors God
lenders.occupational_info: I help people purchase homes and keep their homes if they are in financial trouble

lenders.name: Thomas Koikkara & Shanthi Thomas
lenders.loan_because: that is the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: Supply Chain planning

lenders.name: Ablla
lenders.loan_because: I know the difference a loan can make in someone's life.  It's a small thing to do, but it's the right thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a software company in Irvine, California.

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupation: Ph.D. student and Special Education Teacher
lenders.loan_because: We are all accountable to each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children with disabilities, and I research ways to increase independence for persons with severe/profound disabilities.

lenders.name: Leonard
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Hillevi & Bruce
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference.  What better way than to band together and let someone know that we believe in them.  How uplifting for us all.
lenders.occupational_info: We are starting our own small business in residential real estate and personal property appraisal, and hot air ballooning in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Everyone willing to work should have the opportunity to succeed in their dreams.

lenders.name: John and Tetyana
lenders.loan_because: We give thanks to God for all the blessings He has given to us.  Much is required of those who have been given much.  We care for those who work hard to help themselves.  May God Bless them.
lenders.occupational_info: John and Tetyana are retired. Tetyana is a retired medical doctor originally from Ukraine. Like many others, she suffered during  the collapse of the USSR and is sensitive to those who are working hard to improve their lives in Ukraine and Elsewhere.

lenders.name: Rochelle
lenders.loan_because: I have a passion for helping people

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: Everyone can use some help sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: Just spreading a few seeds of happiness...

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a contribution to someone else's success and happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: For many years, I was a teacher of English as a Second Language in a community college.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I prefer to give a hand up than a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the secret weapon in keeping national fleets on the road through safety and cost-saving solutions.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help in a more direct way that I know is going directly to the people in need. Helping  another person improve their quality of life while keeping their dignity intact.
lenders.occupational_info: I am back in school to finish a psychology/sociology degree.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate and truly blessed to have so much abundance in my life.  I feel I have an obligation to help those less fortunate and Kiva affords a fantastic way of providing assistance to wonderful, hard-working people around the world who are trying to make their lives better.

lenders.name: Frederick
lenders.loan_because: My fellow man deserves a trusting hand. "What goes around - comes around"
lenders.occupational_info: Helping the elderly, and the not-so-fortunate.

lenders.name: Quicksilver
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I like to help people when I can.  Me being a kitten sometimes makes it hard to do because I don't have any money unless I sell some of my food to other cats, or kill a mouse.
lenders.occupational_info: It's my job to keep mice & rats out of my owners house.  When I catch a mouse and kill it dead, he rewards me by letting me make a loan to someone on Kiva.org.  Wish there were more mice around here.

lenders.name: Ed and Evan
lenders.loan_because:
Making a difference, however you can,
is important.
lenders.occupational_info:
It maybe only a small thing, but it
can lead to great things.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference for someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I rent property to others so they can make a living.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: To share my good fortune with those in need.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to use technology to build systems that help people.  Sometimes the systems I use are high tech electronics and sometimes they are low tech.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women who have a desire to better themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Before I retired it was my job to bring people together to find ways to solve problems and find ways to do things better.

lenders.name: Asmah
lenders.loan_because: many reasons
lenders.occupational_info: Student of life

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I usually think I'm very poor, then I realize that I have more than most of the people in this world, and that makes me very grateful for my life.

My parents owned a small corner store for about 10 years. I know and respect the amount of work invovled with these venutres and I am blessed to be able to help these hard working people.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is as a public service lawyer. My work is as a servant of the Lord.

lenders.name: Manuokalewa
lenders.loan_because: it is my duty to God to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the chef on staff at a mega church.  I prepare meals for conferences and teach adults with special needs, how to cook.

lenders.name: Allison & Joe

lenders.occupational_info: Joe writes for newspapers and magazines, and teaches writing. He aspires to be a novelist. Allison works for the Canadian government promoting equity in the workplace.

2. Helping a parent in business will allow them to provide more opportunities for their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach the third graders of today and the leaders of tomorrow.

lenders.name: Ranga
lenders.loan_because: I can and everybody who could should.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Engineer responsible for testing and approving construction materials for large projects in a major city.

lenders.name: Bibi and Phil

lenders.occupational_info: new at this...

lenders.name: M.O. Swain

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a school that helps young people obtain their G.E.D. and continue their education beyond.

lenders.name: Rainette
lenders.loan_because: I care.  You are important to my husband (Jesus) and I and we feel that what you want to do is important and we believe in you and your dream. God Bless and Good Luck!
lenders.occupational_info: I do not work now outside of the home.  When I did I was in the medical firld.  My husband works with computers. He also loves photography.

lenders.name: Phoebe
lenders.loan_because: Jesus Christ gives abundantly to me.
lenders.occupational_info: Medical student

lenders.name: K J
lenders.loan_because: Because I feel blessed to live a comfortable, fulfilling life and  to be able to help others. I come from a very humble background and people helped me along the way. I want to give back and encourage others to follow their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a company called Learning Gurus. When companies need to train and educate their employees, we help them find great  trainers, writers, project managers, and technology experts.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can help someone!

lenders.loan_because: i am kurd man from syria.olso i a doctor no i kanet werker bikos i don.t have many i wen.t helep from iny man 4159567389474767 cerd finans in turkya

lenders.name: Ali

lenders.occupational_info: I have 30 yreas experiance in Telecommunication Planning and Network Desing.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It allows me to connect to the world at large: to look beyond my town, state, country limits.

lenders.name: Rose

lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse reviewing the accuracy of hospital bills.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I totally do NOT recommend this website because they use Paypal, and it's too hard to get your money back, and with Paypal, you may NEVER get your money back.  I'll never lend money again here, I'm done.

lenders.name: Ronald & Theresa
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people better themselves on a one to one basis

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I live with the reminder of people hurt and in need everyday.

lenders.name: Luci and Jim
lenders.loan_because: We've been very fortunate and want to assist others to become successful too.
lenders.occupational_info: We rent movies from the companies that make them, show them in our movie theater and sell tickets and movie food to our loyal customers. We are in "show business" in a small resort town in the mountains of Colorado.

lenders.name: Kuranes
lenders.loan_because: tengo gusto de ayudar a la gente

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: it is the right and just thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer the phones, greet clients and perform a wide variety of administrative tasks in a law firm of 20 attorneys and staff personnel.

lenders.name: Kai
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to share my bounty with other women.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: People who are willing to work to make their lives better deserve a way to do that.    Kiva offers a simple way that I can help.

lenders.name: Kiote
lenders.loan_because: Love

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of the other people on this planet, if only in a small way. The way of life we enjoy in the United States usually comes at the expense of others - usually by "acquiring" their country's resources and/or "encouraging" them to accept trade deals that only benefit the US and/or propping up some oppressive puppet government.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a former member of the US Military and am now self employed.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a hand up not a handout.

lenders.name: Arne
lenders.occupational_info: I'm running online surveys and assessment-center for people manager

lenders.name: Belle
lenders.loan_because: Microloans allow us to help hardworking people  around the world to thrive in their businesses and their lives.

lenders.name: Yahn-Rurng

lenders.name: Abdiwali
lenders.loan_because: Micro financing is one way I can make a difference, and can fulfill my share of responsibility towards helping the human family.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: Everyone with a realistic idea and a good plan should have access to capital.
lenders.occupational_info: Using commercial real estate to meet people's everyday needs.

lenders.name: Cris
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping women everywhere to find their independent and entrepreneurial spirit
lenders.occupational_info: I help young children learn to communicate with their family and others

lenders.name: Jeff & Myrcia
lenders.loan_because: "All humans have the inner capacity not only to care for themselves but also to contribute to increasing the well-being of the world as a whole"  Mohammad Yunis

lenders.name: Babette

lenders.name: Bonnie

lenders.occupational_info: Retired public servant, now voluteering in gov't office

lenders.name: David

lenders.occupational_info: Computer Consultant

lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great concept where people can help others who have the drive to be successful and become self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I test aircraft.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: It is better to give than receive.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: This is a way I can help others in many diffrent places.

Environmental compliance (Kevin) 
Credit Union Finance (Teresa)

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Helping someone else means more (and the satisfaction lasts longer) than does spending money on myself, and the small sum of money involved goes so much further in the developing world than it does here.

lenders.name: Ed719
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the world to help those that want to help themselves. I feel like my life is blessed, so I'd like to empower others to fulfill any dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Work hard...play hard

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: Germantown, MD

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I Know how Hard it can be to start a Business and for these people its a way to Support there Families and a way to Have a better Life. Changing the world One Small Deed at a time!
lenders.occupational_info: I Own and Operate a Oriental Grocery Store In GA and My Business has been good to me and i hope i can Help someone Fulfill their Dream of Business Ownership

lenders.loan_because: I like the direct connection to entrepreneurs.  I love the idea of lending a hand as opposed to giving a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I implement computer software to help companies be more effective.

lenders.name: Skip & Donna
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed in our lives & have seen first hand the loving caring people in poor countries such as Mexico who just need a hand up.

lenders.loan_because: To be a blessing for someone in need for the glory of God.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired -Sales Rep. for over 33 years in the home furnishings field.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I was blessed with the opportunity to do so. I was blessed with the ability to live a life free from hunger and oppressive poverty. If with this small amount I help someone liberate themselves from the shackles of poverty, the loan will pay back much more than just money.

lenders.name: Lynette
lenders.loan_because: Kiva lets me help others, the way people have helped my family in the past.

lenders.name: Mike and Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want peace
lenders.occupational_info: I love all people

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: We have to start somewhere...
lenders.occupational_info: I am an accounting manager.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Jayne
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for my four healthy children and all the opportunities that we have been blessed with.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children who live in the city about living on a farm and caring for the farm animals. We have horses, sheep, goats, chickens, rabbits and a pig. Most of these children have had no contact with animals except for dogs and cats.  I also enjoy sewing, knitting, and crafts. I admire anyone who has the drive to make their life better for their family.

lenders.name: Skylar
lenders.loan_because: My Mommy and Daddy want me to learn about the world and help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to play!

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because:
This is a great way to help people improve their living conditions.  I can't afford to offer much, but the bit of money I can lend is doing some real good all over the world.  

I started out with just a few loans because that's all I could afford.  But after each loan is repaid, I lend the money to more people through Kiva.  By doing this, I've been able to help 72 people so far!  It's a wonderful feeling to know that I've done some good in the world.

With everyone offering what they can, it adds up to make a true difference to people in need.  What a wonderful thing Kiva is!

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: My world, no matter how big or small, will be better because I am here.
lenders.occupational_info: Attorney & CPO, Privacy Dir at Liberty Coalition, GW Law and U of Utah grad, Husband & Father of 6 kids. Mormon Helping Hands NJ Coordinator.

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to partner with others such that they can work to improve their livlihood.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Materals Manager. I buy materials from suppliers such that factories can produce their products.

lenders.name: Roger & Janet
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to make a little money have a large impact.

lenders.name: Nomhawj
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of any better ways to help people.

lenders.name: Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I believe it is a worthwhile efort to invest in the hopes and dreams of people who have something to contribute.

lenders.name: Karen, Eli & Jorn
lenders.loan_because: Together we will change the world!

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: I learned about Kiva from NPR's Marketplace program, and the concept fascinated me.
lenders.occupational_info: I support people who write computer software.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I build cargo planes that are in use worldwide.

lenders.name: Karyn, Allan & Sam

lenders.occupational_info: Allan is a history professor and author of "The Keys to the White House."  Karyn is a writer and activist.  Sam is a scholar and an athlete.  He plays football and lacrosse.

Weekly: Business Advisor & Program Manager

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: Leveraging the potential of individual.

lenders.name: Deanna & Ram
lenders.loan_because: It's a small way to make a big difference.

lenders.name: Lynn

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I care and I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Lin Family
lenders.loan_because: Blessing from God

lenders.name: The Williams Family
lenders.loan_because: We have been very fortunate and think that this is without a doubt a great way to share our good fortune and involve our whole family.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an entrepreneur who has been through several start up companies and always had investors who had faith in our visions. 

My current organization is an internet development company that specializes in working with non-profit  organizations on e-communications initiatives.

lenders.name: scott
lenders.loan_because: It is a small thing that I can do to help others in need. This world can be a better place for everyone,if everyone would lend a hand to some one else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Architect in San Diego, California

lenders.name: Daniel Durrant
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of creativity and innovation.  When humanity is resourceful and generous with each other anything can be accomplished.

lenders.name: Cindy L
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and I feel blessed because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own consulting and teaching business.

lenders.name: Grandma
lenders.loan_because: The profiles/pictures make the people real and you get a sense that your small loan goes a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on the fiscal side of a non-profit coalition that services rape crisis centers.

lenders.name: NeoAgeBoy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the cause.
lenders.occupational_info:
Trained as an electrical engineer, Neal enjoys his current work developing software for a large defense contractor.  Frequently, he would exercise his managerial power to allocate resources in order to complete projects on time.  One of Neal's favorite quote is, 

"The difference between rats and people is that rats learn from experience."
-B. F. Skinner

As a result, sometimes he can be seen observing the rodents at work to gain insight to their quality.

lenders.name: Heather Hayes
lenders.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do. I'm making this loan in my mom Barbara's honor. Happy Mothers' Day!

I'll never forget people who have helped me get a "leg up" in life: Pat of "Pat's Shoe Repair" in Kilmainham, Dublin: Credit on a shoe repair goes a long way; a mysterious man with a white suit and a white Mercedes, in 1985 La Mancha, who filled our empty gas tank when we were broke and ran out of gas in a beat-up Renault 4--- and hundreds of others. Thanks to you.
lenders.occupational_info: Day-job: interpreter in federal courts. Also musician, screenwriter, etc.,

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: This is the most direct way to raise the standard of living for others in the world, it takes so little to dramatically influence people's lives! If enough capital is put into each of these places everyone's life becomes better.
lenders.occupational_info: We print & package direct mail advertising (aka junk mail)

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the best hope for the world is to invest in the minds and lives of people in parts of the world that need innovation and hope to solve their problems. And in doing so, they might even find a solution for a problem in our part of the world.

lenders.name: Maureen & Jean-Luc
lenders.loan_because: We want to help women in developing countries
lenders.occupational_info: Maureen is an artist (painting, jewelry) who works from home and Jean-Luc works for a large computer company

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: ...loaning assists people to achieve their goals and hopes in a manner that builds confidence, integrity, and a value of independence.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: A little goes a long,long way for these folk.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: Since the concept of micro-loans first started being discussed widely I've thought what a fantastic idea they were, especially for women in developing countries who might not always have access to financial help for whatever reason. Now I can participate in lending which is great!  I know the money goes straight to the person I have chosen without any strings attached other than fair interest.  I am able to see how it's being used and know that it has helped a person realise their dream when it comes back to me - and then I can loan it out again - I like that bit the best :)
lenders.occupational_info: I'm finishing up my PhD in Archaeology, working on the prehistoric diet of Aitutaki in the Cook Islands.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I am making a difference with my Grandchildren.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the safetly of the people in my care that they will not get hurt from the medications that they take.  I am a chemist, drugist or pharmacist depending which country you are in.

lenders.name: David N
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people become successful and improve their lives.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people directly to help themselves.  I stay away from handouts, but this is a venture I can really get behind.  It builds trust, pride, and individual power in a way that donations can't.

lenders.name: Le groupe dextor limitée
lenders.loan_because: The dextor group is determined to grow its shareholder equity while ensuring a dynamic management of long-term investments and ensuring its social responsibility towards the communities.
lenders.occupational_info:
The dextor group is a management and holding company with interest in private and public companies.

It is also actively involved in the community by actively participating in non profit organizations.

lenders.name: Katie & Drew
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of money can make a big differnce here.

lenders.name: Deana and Yoo-Shin
lenders.loan_because: In honour of our wedding guests.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer programmer and Lawyer.

lenders.name: Nadir
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy and affordable way to assist, one step at a time, in the comfort of your home, thousands of miles away.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Canadian Bank and manage the Bank's investments.

lenders.name: Abigail
lenders.loan_because: I feel inspired to share my wealth with others in a sustainable way.

lenders.name: Lyle
lenders.loan_because: I have enough stuff in my life.  It's nice to be able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I inspect boilers and pressure vessels to make sure they are safe.  I go to alot of chemical and petro-chemical plants.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: Big changes can be made with small steps
lenders.occupational_info: I treat dogs and cats for their illnesses so that they can live longer, healthier lives.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in this lifetime. I am agressive in every endeavor that I pursue and I like watching other's realize their dreams. Secretly, I aspire to be a budding entrepreneur one day...myself...but until then, I will watch Kiva recipients do just that...
lenders.occupational_info: I inspect facilities to insure the public's safety.

lenders.name: Jeff and Family
lenders.loan_because: I want to impact the lives of people around the world  by sharing my prosperity through microloans.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell electronic components to design engineers.

lenders.name: Fisk
lenders.loan_because: it's fun.
lenders.occupational_info: I design systems to heat and cool buildings.

lenders.name: Janez
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy it...

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to give a hand up.

lenders.name: Benito
lenders.loan_because: I see this as one means of fulfilling the Great Commission; I have been blessed to be a blessing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university professor and a retired US Army Officer.  I am a social work educator and value independence and self-sufficiency.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I'm making a difference without removing accountability.  It feels good!

lenders.name: Harris Family
lenders.loan_because: I believe that work, done well, gives people great power in their lives.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: The world needs people with dreams, and my dream is to help others realize thier dreams and not everyone is as forturnate as we are in this country, we should spend more helping our nieghbors
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for years to make a living, and finally achieved a goal that others may look at as adding more work, but to me it's a dream come true, - I'm a Micro-farmer (Not much land but a lot of satisfaction) some people would just call me a gardener..I believe in helping others who are willing to take the effort to improve thier lives...

lenders.name: Team Devereaux
lenders.loan_because: it feels right. We have so much, others have so little. Helping them help themselves is the least we can do to make their lives a little better.
lenders.occupational_info: We work in retail and finance. And I blog :) http://www.bigfamilylittleincome.com/

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.occupational_info: I write materials that are used to teach MBA students.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because:
“Give to the one who asks you, and do not turn away from the one who wants to borrow from you.”
-Matthew 5:42

“If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him?”
-1 John 3:17

lenders.name: Leni
lenders.loan_because: We are glad we can help out a little bit, but YOU - the borrowers -- are  the ones who do the real work. May your efforts bring forth good fruits!
lenders.occupational_info: My hobby is cooking and developing recipes that are healthy and easy to make - especially recipes with foods that help to prevent cancer. So I write a blog, http://monamifood.wordpress.com/about/ with simple ideas for preparing dishes that include anti-cancer foods.

lenders.name: Worker
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of people helping each other direct.
lenders.occupational_info: I am business owner just like you.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy helping others.

lenders.name: Peter & Julie
lenders.loan_because: It's fun to see people in less fortunate countries succeed in life.
lenders.occupational_info:
Peter manages the environmental and safety responsibilities of a small company in the United States.  

Julie works for the local county government.

lenders.name: Mike Palmer
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of micro lending and I'm thankful for Kiva to give me the opportunity to help others provide for themselves, their families and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a local company that brews craft beer. In my spare time I am starting a company that makes beer cheese. Hopefully the karma I've been putting in here will return to my own endeavor.

lenders.name: Jakub
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: read, read and read a lot

lenders.name: Bret
lenders.loan_because: it allows me to fight for justice and alleviate hunger.
lenders.occupational_info: I design, build and opperate hotel and restaurant developments. My vision is "To be the primary source of hospitality in the communities we serve by providing our guests the best possible experience and by being good neighbors."

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to be an entrepreneur; it can be exciting and challenging, and also difficult at times.  I want to help hard-working people make their lives better for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have pain or injuries.  By massaging and stretching their muscles, I help increase their circulation and facilitate healing.  I also have my own business as a wellness home consultant with a wellness company called Nikken. When I am not working, I enjoy time with my husband raising my 4 children, ages 8, 6, 4, and 2months.

lenders.name: "G"
lenders.loan_because: I can and ... it is fun to have my own  private "Marshall Plan" for Africa.  Hmmmm...or should I say: "G's Plan"  ? ;-)

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: I am live on this earth

lenders.name: Sheryl
lenders.loan_because: My heart and my spirit moves me to help someone fulfill their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a law firm and assist the attorney by preparing the necessary paperwork to be filed in court  and I correspond with the businesses that we provide services to.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I have never had the ability or funding to start my own business, but feel that being able to help an entrepreneur realize his or her dream can make a real difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that manufactures healthcare equipment like X-ray machines, CT Scanners, etc...  My responsibility is leading the team that keeps the computer systems running that make sure our equipment in hospitals gets serviced.

lenders.name: Sunil
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate and thankful for the opportunities that my parents have provided for me and I only hope to provide someone less fortunate with a hand up. lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to support the efforts of those trying to better their lives by honest and hard work.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a team to facilitate educational exchange as well as cultural dialog through media

lenders.name: Elizabeth

lenders.name: Robert

Having someone offer a helping hand is much better than trying to face the world alone, ill-prepared and unequipped.  I hope by this small gesture, my help can ripple through many lives.

lenders.name: Mehul & Ravisha

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: There are many people out there that just need a little help to be self sufficient.

lenders.name: Frank and Corri

lenders.occupational_info: The Mom in our little family is staying home with our newest little one, the Dad works in a technical field, and our kiddos are having fun being kiddos.
